songs.title: Beside You Babe
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Without even trying when I close my eyes
I see you walking 'round inside of my head
Looking up at the sky shining brighter than a single sunrise
It's ever burned red

[Pre-Chorus]
And I wanna hold you, hold you
Rolling in the warm sunshine
If I never told you, told you
I'm giving you the rest of my life

[Chorus]
'Cause we got the fire tonight
And it makes me wanna dance with my baby
In the dead of the night
Just keep on moving and grooving 'til the daylight
I'll be right beside you, babe, 'til the end of time

[Verse 2]
I've been bragging about you
Baby, you can bet I've been calling up all of my friends
Don't you know I've been counting down the days?
Feeling just crazy enough to call up your old man

[Pre-Chorus]
And I wanna hold you, hold you
Rolling in the warm sunshine
If I never told you, told you
I'm giving you the rest of my life

[Chorus]
'Cause we got the fire tonight
And it makes me wanna dance with my baby
In the dead of the night
Just keep on moving and grooving 'til the daylight
I'll be right beside you, babe, 'til the end of time

[Instrumental]

[Pre-Chorus]
I wanna hold you, hold you
Rolling in the warm sunshine
And if I never told you, told you
I'm giving you the rest of my life

[Chorus]
'Cause we got the fire tonight
And it makes me wanna dance with my baby
In the dead of the night
Just keep on moving and grooving 'til the daylight
I'll be right beside you, babe, 'til the end of time

[Outro]
I wanna hold you, hold you
